title: Heavy Metal Anthem
positivePrompt: An aggressive, high-energy heavy metal track that explodes from the start with dual, heavily distorted guitars playing tight, chugging riffs over a powerful, driving drum beat. The male vocalist delivers a forceful, slightly raspy performance in a mid-to-high range, perfectly matching the song's intensity. The arrangement features a classic metal structure, highlighted by a melodic and technical guitar solo filled with fast runs and expressive bends. The production is clean yet powerful, emphasizing the punch of the drums and the sharp attack of the guitars, creating an anthemic and rebellious mood.
lyrics:
[Intro - Guitar Riff]

[Verse 1]
Rip the script, break it mold
Shatter chains, dare the bold
Took your crown, you can't ignore
Freedom's knock on every door

[Chorus]
Break the chains, let it pour
Shout it loud, beg no more
Burn the rules, end the war
We're alive, can't ignore
Can't ignore

[Verse 2]
Tear it down, brick by brick
Every lie, every trick
Skies on fire, won't obey
Chaos calls, don't delay

[Chorus]
Break the chains, let it pour
Shout it loud, beg no more
Burn the rules, end the war
We're alive, can't ignore
Can't ignore

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 3]
Echoes scream, hearts collide
No surrender, no divide
Wolves are howling, hear their cry
We rise up, won't comply

[Chorus]
Break the chains, let it pour
Shout it loud, beg no more
Burn the rules, end the war
We're alive, can't ignore
Can't ignore

[Outro - Guitar Riff]
[abrupt silence]

title: Desert Echoes (Indian Fusion)
positivePrompt: female vocals,rap,modern,hip hibhi, Indian fusion,whispered.
lyrics:
[Intro - Plucked Synth Melody]

[Verse 1]
The sun melts over the endless plain
A mirage dances like a golden chain
Bare feet trace stories in the cracked dry land
Who holds the map in this empty game?

[Chorus]
Desert echoes
They call my name
Drums of the earth, they beat the same
Step to the rhythm, no one to blame
Desert echoes
Desert echoes

[Instrumental Break - Plucked Synth Melody]

[Verse 2]
A lone wind whispers secrets untold
Stars blink brighter than the city's gold
My shadow stretches long in the moonlit fold
This is my world, fierce and bold

[Bridge]
Do you hear it? The silence screams
Did you see it? The shifting dreams
[Vocal chop: 'dreams']

[Chorus]
Desert echoes
They call my name
Drums of the earth, they beat the same
Step to the rhythm, no one to blame
Desert echoes

[Plucked synth melody fades out]

title: New Low (Synthpop Ballad)
positivePrompt: Romantic and active synthpop anthem. Captures the joyful energy and the irresistible charm , delivered with bright, engaging female vocals in a similar style , Feelgood and danceable.
lyrics:
Midnight talks with my regrets,
Whiskey lips and cigarettes.
Promises like shattered glass,
Cut me deep but never last.

I danced with fire, played the fool,
Broke the rules and called it cool.
Now the mirror wont lie
I dont recognize these eyes.

I was right, I was left
Caught between the lines, no regrets
I was wrong, I was left behind
Like a shadow fading with the light

I've been up, but mostly down
Chasing dreams that hit the ground
Every high just slips away
Leaving echoes of my name

I was right, I was left,
Torn in two with every step.
I was wrong, I was left behind,
Another love I couldnt find.

Ive been up, but mostly down,
Chasing highs that let me drown.
I was right, I was left,
Now Im at a new low.

Silent screams, a crowded room,
Laughing loud to hide the bruise.
You said "forever," but it bends,
Til "goodbye" is how it ends.

I built a castle out of dust,
Leaned on love I couldnt trust.
Now the ashes taste like smoke,
Another joke I didnt know.

I was strong, I was weak
Fighting battles I can't repeat
I was lost, then I was found
But the silence is the loudest sound

I've been up, but mostly down
Painted smiles hide my frown
Every step feels like the past
Running fast but never last

I was right, I was left,
Torn in two with every step.
I was wrong, I was left behind,
Another love I couldnt find.

Ive been up, but mostly down,
Chasing highs that let me drown.
I was right, I was left,
Now Im at a new low.

One more drink to numb the pain,
One more name I cant erase.
Funny how the fall feels slow
Now Im at a new low.

Ne lo, ne lo, ne lo ooh
Whispered words I used to know
Ne lo, ne lo, ne lo ooh
Love just comes and love just goes

Maybe one day Ill be free
From the chains of memory
Till then, Ill sing it low
Nelo, nelo, ne lo

I was right, I was left,
Torn in two with every step.
I was wrong, I was left behind,
Another love I couldnt find.

Ive been up, but mostly down,
Chasing highs that let me drown.
I was right, I was left,
Now Im at a new low.

I've been right; I've been left
I've been wrong; I've been left behind
I've been up, but mostly down

I've been right; I've been left
I've been wrong; I've been left behind
I've been up, but mostly down

I was right I was left
I was wrong I was left behind
Ive been up but mostly down.

title: Moonlit Jazz Duet
positivePrompt: A smooth, jazzy lo-fi hip-hop track built on a foundation of a gentle piano melody and a relaxed, steady drum machine groove. A warm, round bassline provides a solid harmonic base. The song features a duet between a clear, melodic female vocalist and a smooth, conversational male vocalist who trade verses and harmonize beautifully in the choruses. The arrangement is punctuated by tasteful, melodic saxophone fills that enhance the jazzy, late-night atmosphere. The track concludes with an extended instrumental outro where the saxophone takes center stage with an expressive, improvisational solo over the core piano and rhythm section, before fading out with a final, lingering piano chord and a soft whoosh effect.
lyrics:
[Intro: Piano & Saxophone]

[Verse 1: Female Vocal]
月光落进窗
像是起色的那杯
你还在我的心底旋转
抛开所有烦忧
这爱像流星坠落
在夜空闪耀
无需解答 心动是唯一的解药

[Verse 2: Male Vocal]
你的眼神像迷宫
我徘徊其中
每个音符都带了心脏的轰鸣
触碰你的温度就像电流穿心
无法抗拒你的爱把我拉入梦境

[Chorus: Duet]
心跳随着你狂奔
如海潮汹涌
爱的节奏翻滚着
像梦境中梦
你的名字是旋律
旋律中成风
每一拍都诉说爱无声的悸动

[Instrumental Break: Saxophone Solo]

[Verse 3: Male Vocal]
黑夜像个舞台
我们点了彩灯
节拍跟随心跳
默契融成一吻
别让夜晚停下来
爱永远在认真
每一秒都像歌
开启奇妙人生

[Chorus: Duet]
心跳随着你狂奔
如海潮汹涌
爱的节奏翻滚着
像梦境中梦
你的名字是旋律
旋律中成风
每一拍都诉说爱无声的悸动

[Bridge: Duet]
当黎明来临时
我们点燃光芒
你的爱是我心中最暖的信仰
再多风雨兼程
也不愿停下
因为你的存在是我唯一牵挂

[Instrumental Break: Saxophone Solo]

[Chorus: Duet]
心跳随着你狂奔
如海潮汹涌
爱的节奏翻滚着
像梦境中梦
你的名字是旋律
旋律中成风
每一拍都诉说爱无声的悸动

[Outro: Duet & Saxophone]
当黎明来临时
我们点燃光芒
你的爱是我心中最暖的信仰
再多风雨兼程
也不愿停下
因为你的存在是我唯一牵挂
[Saxophone melody fades out]

title: K-Pop EDM Anthem
positivePrompt: An explosive, high-energy K-pop and EDM track driven by a relentless four-on-the-floor beat and a pulsing synth bassline. The arrangement opens with a bright piano melody and shimmering arpeggiated synths before slamming into the main groove. A powerful, clear male lead vocal delivers an anthemic melody, punctuated by energetic ad-libs and hype-man shouts. The production is dense with layered synthesizers, including soaring leads, atmospheric pads, and dynamic FX like risers and sweeps that build tension into the explosive choruses. A mid-song instrumental break features a melodic synth lead and vocal chops, leading into a final, climactic chorus and an abrupt ending with a tape-stop sound effect.

title: Industrial Dark Fantasy
positivePrompt: The movement begins with haunting industrial drones and metallic clangs, gradually building tension through sparse, piercing high arpeggios. A relentless, pounding rhythm—driven by synthesized industrial beats and deep percussion—propels the music forward with unyielding force. Dark fantasy instruments like bass clarinet, contrabassoon, and muted horns weave chaotic, hypnotic arpeggios that spiral rapidly, creating a sense of dark pursuit. Midway, a tense pause leads into chaotic eruptions of layered crashes, distorted textures, and fast motifs that evoke a high-speed chase through a nightmarish realm. The intensity peaks as chaos subsides into distant echoes, ending in a lingering, ominous silence that leaves a sense of ongoing darkness and danger.
lyrics:
[Intro Industrial drones, metallic clangs, sparse high arpeggios, building tension]

[Build-Up Steady percussion, rising rapid arpeggios, gritty textures, increasing suspense]

[Main Drive / Chase Relentless rhythm, intertwined arpeggios, industrial crashes, dissonance, chaos]

[Suspense Moment Brief pause, sustained dissonant drone, slow distorted arpeggio, then re-engagement]

[Climax / Chaos Peak intensity: fast arpeggios, layered metallic sounds, aggressive textures, chaos]

[Ominous Fade Slow deceleration, industrial noise fades, final high arpeggio or clang, ending in silence]

title: Seeing You Never (R&B)
positivePrompt: contemporary R&B
lyrics:
Save your explanation
I don't wanna hear it baby
Lay off with your handy work of candy words
You don't get to call me up later
Anyone can do better than you
You can't tell grime from jewels
But I'm too chic for no vendettas
I'll tell you though
It takes a brain to leave and I went to school
Whyn't you go and tell that bitch I wish her best of luck
Honey he gon' make a break for the door when it's too much
He gon' make a beeline for me but I won't give no fucks
You're full of shit 24/7 mi corazon
I hope your mama proud she raised a pussy for a son
I won't be there be seeing you never
I'm living free light as a feather
When you're chilly alone in December
Just remember I'll be seeing you never
Cruisin' down 11th
Glance to my right the passenger seat's unoccupied
Here's how I know that we had nothin'
'Cause when I'm driving alone
There's no waft of your cologne
I'm so relieved I swear I could cry
I dodged a bullet when I bid you that fast goodbye
Why mister you missed a dollar to get you a dime
It's bewildering that you would leave a vixen for a snake
You beg me not to hate you so here's what I stipulate
Whyn't you go ahead and pack up your shit
That includes your ugly ass suedes yeah
I was so good to you I gave you all my assets a la carte
I let you pick and choose all the desires of your heart
Joke's on you for messing all that up babe
Your foolishness is state of the art
Guess
I'll be seeing you never
I'm living free light as a feather
When you're chilly alone in December
Just remember I'll be seeing you never

title: Shadows of Neon (Post-Punk)
positivePrompt: A driving post-punk arrangement kicks off with layered electric guitars—one clean and arpeggiated, the other providing distorted chordal texture—over a solid bassline and powerful live drums. The male lead vocal is delivered with an angsty, strained quality that builds into an anthemic, shouted chorus where his voice cracks with emotion. Following a melodic yet noisy guitar solo filled with feedback and expressive bends, the track breaks down to its core rhythmic elements before fading out on lingering guitar noise.
lyrics:
[Intro - Arpeggiated Electric Guitar]

[Verse 1]
Under neon lights, they flicker and fade
Lost in the hum of this restless parade
A city's heartbeat pulses in my veins
Searching for answers in the acid rain
Shadows stretch long, they're clawing my way
The night is alive but it's mine to obey

[Chorus]
Oh, shadows of neon
Where do you run?
Bleeding out the night just to make us one
Oh, shadows of neon
Tell me the truth
Are you the ghost or the one I chase with you?

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 2]
The walls are whispering secrets they can't keep
Echoes of footsteps buried six feet deep
Every corner's a story you'll never forget
I'm tangled in chaos, dressed up as regret

[Chorus]
Oh, shadows of neon
Where do you run?
Bleeding out the night just to make us one
Oh, shadows of neon
Tell me the truth
Are you the ghost or the one I chase with you?

[Outro - Extended Guitar Solo]
[Music fades out]

title: J-Pop Electronic
positivePrompt: An energetic, bilingual J-pop and French pop vocal performance over a driving electronic beat. The track is built on a foundation of punchy synth bass, crisp drum machine rhythms, and layered synthesizers. A powerful female lead vocal delivers catchy melodies in Japanese, contrasted by a male rapper who performs a verse in French and English. The production is polished and modern, featuring vocal chops, synth arpeggios, and dynamic builds that lead into an anthemic, soaring chorus with layered harmonies and expressive vocal ad-libs. The song concludes with a brief, reflective spoken-word section in Japanese before fading out.

title: Heartstrings (Country Folk)
positivePrompt: A classic country-folk ballad driven by a steady acoustic guitar rhythm and a warm, earnest male vocal with a gentle twang. A simple bassline and a straightforward drum beat establish a heartfelt, mid-tempo groove. A plaintive harmonica weaves in and out, providing melodic fills and taking the lead during the instrumental breaks and the extended outro. The production is clean and direct, focusing on the storytelling and the sincere vocal performance, creating a nostalgic and romantic atmosphere.
lyrics:
[Intro - Acoustic Guitar]

[Verse 1]
Found you standing in the river's roar
Heartbeats racing like never before
Eyes met mine and time stood still
Dreams were spinning 'round this hill
Walking barefoot on a dusty road
Fingers tracing where the pelo grow
Hear your laugh, it's a sweet melody
Love a tune that sets me free

[Chorus]
I'll ride these heartstrings all night long
Sing our song where we belong
In the quiet moments where we're strong
Your heartbeat's my favorite song

[Instrumental Break - Harmonica Solo]

[Verse 2]
Stars above us start to glow
Evening whispers, soft and low
Underneath the moonlit sky
We're just two souls, you and I
In the silence, hearts will find their tune
Underneath the prairie moon

[Instrumental Break - Acoustic Guitar]

[Bridge]
I'll ride those heartstrings 'til they stray
We'll find our way back someday

[Chorus]
I'll ride these heartstrings all night long
Sing our song where we belong
In the quiet moments where we're strong
Your heartbeat's my favorite song

[Outro - Harmonica and Guitar]
[Final guitar strum]

title: Pipa Song (Chinese Classical Rock)
positivePrompt: A dramatic, cinematic rock interpretation of a classical Chinese poem, blending traditional lyrical imagery with modern electric instrumentation. The arrangement features dynamic contrasts: verses are intimate and narrative-driven with clean guitar and sparse percussion, while the chorus erupts with distorted power chords, driving drums, and expressive lead guitar mimicking the intensity of the pipa. Male vocals deliver the ancient text with gravitas, occasionally layered with ethereal backing harmonies to evoke the moonlit river scene.

title: Get On Up (Funk)
positivePrompt: Funk, Soul, Groove, Male Vocals, Slap Bass, Electric Guitar, Drum Kit, Horn Section, Upbeat, Syncopated, Tight, Dance, Virtuosic, Odd Time Signatures, Polyrhythms, Technical, Thematic, Melodic, Heavy Riffing, 1970s, Party, Sweat, Energy, Rhythm, Wah-Wah, Clavinet, Organ, Trumpet, Saxophone, Trombone, Pocket
lyrics:
[Drum Break - Vintage Drum Kit playing a tight syncopated breakbeat]
Get on up!

[Verse 1 - Slap Bass Guitar playing a fast thumb-and-pop riff]
I feel the rhythm moving in my feet
Walking down the sunny side of the street

[Chorus - Horn Section hitting sharp staccato accents on the one]
Give it up, turn it loose!
We got the funk and we got the juice!

[Bridge - Hammond B3 Organ playing percussive stabs]
Shake it down, shake it all around

title: Break 'Em (Dark DnB)
positivePrompt: A dark ominous high energy aggressive drum and bassintro driven by heavily processed vocal chops and synth melody that serve as both rhythmic and melodic hooks. The song opens with layered, pitched-down crisp deep female-sounding vocal samples creating an atmospheric texture before slamming into a high-tempo breakbeat at 0:12. A powerful bassline underpins the driving rhythm section. The arrangement is dynamic, featuring intense build-ups where filters sweep open to create tension, soft strained haunting crisp female vocals softly sings the verse, followed by impactful drops that reintroduce the core groove. The vocal samples are treated as instruments rather than lyrical carriers, chopped and pitched to form catchy phrases like 'don't make me' and 'break'em' that define the track's character.
lyrics:
[Intro lead hook melody with fast drum beat fades in]

[Verse - Deep bass melody with soft strained female voice]
I never asked for this, but you've got what's coming,
Brace yourself now, 'cause there's no more running.
My shadows are creeping, time to face the fate,
No more hiding, it's decided now, it's too late.

[Pre Chorus - pleading male voice movie sample] Why does it have to be this way.

[Chorus female voice] BREAK'EM Oi la la Oi la la, BREAK'EM Oi la la Oi la la

[Post Chorus female voice] It's too late, It's too late, it's too late, it's too late!

[Spoken word movie sample] LET THE BEAT DROP!!!

[Breakdown - Heavy half time trap phonk style groove]

[Pre Chorus - anguished male voice movie sample] Why does it have to be this way.

[Chorus] BREAK'EM Oi la la Oi la la, BREAK'EM Oi la la Oi la la

[Outro]

title: Vocal Chops DnB
positivePrompt: An energetic drum and bass track driven by heavily processed vocal chops that serve as both rhythmic and melodic hooks. The song opens with layered, pitched-up female-sounding vocal samples creating an atmospheric texture before slamming into a high-tempo breakbeat at 0:12. A powerful synth bassline underpins the driving rhythm section. The arrangement is dynamic, featuring intense build-ups where filters sweep open to create tension, followed by impactful drops that reintroduce the core groove. The vocal samples are treated as instruments rather than lyrical carriers, chopped and pitched to form catchy phrases like 'uh' and 'ah' that define the track's character.

[Verse]
[Pre Chorus]
[Chorus]

title: Cat Phonk
positivePrompt: An aggressive, high-energy phonk track, driven by a sharp, repetitive cowbell pattern that defines the groove. Dark minor-key synths blend with Japanese-inspired instruments such as koto plucks, shamisen-style melodies, and taiko-like percussion hits, creating an eastern atmosphere layered over a gritty trap framework. The rhythm is powered by a punchy, hard-clipped drum kit and an overdriven, distorted 808 bass typical of phonk. A deep, low-pitched male vocal delivers a raw rap performance, characterized by a monotone, chant-like flow and heavy processing including saturation, phasing, distortion, and tape-style compression. Lo-fi vinyl noise, subtle pitch warble, glitchy dropouts, and abrupt beat cuts reinforce the raw Memphis aesthetic and underground phonk character.
lyrics:
[Intro – whispered, distorted]
Yeah… meow…

[Verse 1]
I'm a cat with a laptop, paws on the pad
Tryna cook a beat but the beat cook me back
Hit the space bar—whoops, deleted the track
Tail hit the mouse, now the screen go black

I got nine lives, zero clue
GarageBand cryin' like "what you do?"
Mic smell like tuna, cables in knots
Every time I rap I just knock down pots

Tryna sound hard, tryna sound mean
But I cough up hair in between sixteen
Producer said "yo, keep the tempo straight"
I sat on the keyboard, changed the key to "HISS"

[Pre-Chorus]
Lights low, bowl empty, vibes kinda sad
I wanted a hit, now I mad in my pad
Dreams of fame, but the song fell apart
So I cry in autotune from the litter box heart

[Chorus]
Meow, Purrra, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu
Meow, Purrra, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu
Meow, Purrra, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu, Miu

title: Eclipse Heart
positivePrompt: Slow tempo,haunting piano,deep strings,somber mood,echoing vocals,soft acoustic guitar,silence,slow beat gradually builds,reflecting loss in a haunting melody.
lyrics:
[Intro - Arpeggiated Electric Guitar]

[Verse 1]
Shadows whisper secrets low
In the night where dreams won't go
Haunted by the ghost of you
Lost in echoes breaking through

[Chorus]
Eclipse heart, a fading light
Lost in darkness of the night
Holding on to pieces of us
In this nightmare's tender trust

[Verse 2]
Silence screams beneath the stars
Drowning out these distant scars
Phantom love, a bitter cup
Afraid to wake and face it all

[Pre-Chorus]
Whispers linger in the haze
'Neath the moonlit, gothic gaze
Love decays in whispered lines
Dancing shadows intertwine

[Chorus]
Eclipse heart, a fading light
Lost in darkness of the night
Holding on to pieces of us
In this nightmare's tender trust

[Bridge]
Twisted fate and broken ties
Heartbeat fading slow goodbyes
In your eyes I see the end
But I'll love you once again

[Outro - Instrumental]
[Guitar and synths fade out]

title: Edge of the Night (Symphonic Metal Duet)
positivePrompt: Duet, symphonic metal, epic
lyrics:
[Intro – Orchestral strings swelling into a heavy, marching rhythm with operatic backing choirs]

[Verse 1 – Female Vocal – Soprano, haunting and clear]
I see you walking through the ash and the grey
A king without a kingdom, lost in the fray
The stars have turned their backs on your holy crusade
Now you stand before the mess that you made

[Verse 2 – Male Vocal – Baritone, gritty and weary]
I hear your voice inside the howl of the wind
A siren calling out the weight of my sin
My armor is shattered, my banner is torn
I curse the very hour that I was born

[Pre-Chorus – Call and Response]
[Female Vocal] Surrender the ghost, let the darkness in
[Male Vocal] I'm fighting a war that I cannot win
[Duet] The hourglass breaks, let the ritual begin

[Chorus – Duet – Anthemic, soaring harmonies over double-bass drums and symphonic layers]
We stand upon the edge of the night
Between the shadow and the dying light
The heavens fall, the earth divides
There is no shelter, nowhere left to hide
(Nowhere left to hide)

[Verse 3 – Female Vocal – Soft, seductive, building to power]
Why do you struggle when the end is so sweet?
Lay down your sword and bow at my feet
The void is a mother who welcomes you home
You were never meant to face this alone

[Verse 4 – Male Vocal – Aggressive, regaining strength]
You offer me peace but your hands are cold
I won't sell my soul for your glitter and gold
If I have to burn, then I'll burn like the sun
My final battle has only begun

[Bridge – Duet – Dramatic, tense build; orchestral swells to a near-crescendo, choirs fading to a whisper]
[Female Vocal] The gods have abandoned their broken creation
No prayer unspoken, no absolution
Your fire will fade, your resolve will bend
The dark is eternal, the light has an end
[Male Vocal] My fire may fade but my heart still rages
No chain can bind me, no cage can cage this
I'll carve my name in the ashes and stone
I'll fight till my last breath, I'll fight alone
[Duet – Building, strings crashing, drums thundering]
We are the storm in the calm, the thorn in the rose
The blood in the soil, the fire in the cold
No fate can break us, no shadow can hold
We rise from the ashes, we stand, we unfold

[Pre-Chorus – Call and Response, amplified; operatic choirs blaring, full orchestral force]
The hourglass breaks, let the ritual begin

[Chorus – Duet – Explosive, soaring peak; double-bass drums pounding, symphonic layers crashing, choirs belting in harmony]
We stand upon the edge of the night
Between the shadow and the dying light
The heavens fall, the earth divides
There is no shelter, nowhere left to hide
We tear through the dark, we ignite the sky
We burn through the silence, we fight, we survive
The heavens fall, the earth divides
There is no shelter, nowhere left to hide
(Nowhere left to hide)

[Outro – Orchestral fade; choirs softening to a hum, strings winding down, a single piano note lingering. Male vocal whisper, female vocal echo.]
[Orchestral strings fade to black, a final drum thud cutting the silence]

title: Spin the Same (Dark Carnival Trap)
positivePrompt: Dark carnival trap. Circus calliope meets 808 sub-bass. Horror clown aesthetic with modern hi-hat programming and maniacal rap delivery
lyrics:
[Verse]
Woke up in the same architecture
Memory's texture, pressure's lecture
Same four walls, same projector
Groundhog cycle, same connector
Skeleton key in the same door
Same hallway, same worn floor

[Verse]
Broke the mirror, broke the measure
Broke the tether, broke the pressure
But the pieces knew their lecture
Reassembled, same texture
The shards spelled out my name backwards
Same story, same fractured actors

[Verse]
Found the pattern in the fracture
Same departure, same recapture
The loop's not outside, it's the passenger
I'm the driver and the passenger
I built the cage, I am the cage
Same script, same stage

[Chorus]
Spin the same, make it stranger
Frame the pain, rearrange it
Name the game, then derange it
Spin the same, make it stranger

[Bridge]
Round's got corners, sound's got mourners
Back's got forwards, map's got orders
Lost the compass, compass got borders
Cost the promise, promise got quarters

[Chorus]
Spin the same, make it stranger
Stack the lack, make it major
Track attack, make it wager
Spin the same, make it stranger

[Outro]
Spin the same, spin the same, spin the same
But the danger's got a new name
Same same same same same same
But the frame's got a new game

title: Chiptune Breakbeat
positivePrompt: An intense, high-octane chiptune track driven by rapid-fire breakbeat drum patterns and frantic, arpeggiated square-wave synth leads that evoke classic video game soundscapes. The arrangement is dense with layers of fast-paced melodic phrases using sawtooth wave synths and punchy digital textures. A brief breakdown around the midpoint introduces a swirling siren-like riser before slamming back into an even more frenetic section featuring aggressive, almost gabber-style kicks underpinning the main melody. The production maintains a relentless pace throughout, characterized by its clean yet intentionally lo-fi aesthetic and hyperactive energy.
lyrics: [instrumental]

title: Frog vs Tree (80s Rap Battle)
positivePrompt: 1980s b-boy funk rap. Early hip-hop breakbeat culture meeting live funk session. Old school rap cadence with DJ cutting and scratching. No melodic hooks, no sung vocals, pure competitive mic presence
lyrics:
[Verse 1 - Female Vocal]
I hawk loogies that burn holes in the topographical map
You're a bird-poop collector, a stationary squirrel trap
I swap my skin out like a stolen credit card
You're just vertical firewood, rotting in the yard

[Verse 2 - Male Vocal]
I got beetle larvae digging trenches in my side older than you
You're a wet balloon with a ribbit and a high IQ?
I drink groundwater filtered through sixty feet of dirt
You look like a green booger wiped on a flannel shirt

[Chorus - Duet]
Magic mucus meets the hardwood floor
One breaks the laws of physics, the other is a bore
Sawdust and spells, the clash of the swamp
One gets chopped for lumber, the other gets the stomp

[Verse 3 - Female Vocal]
I pull gold coins from the ears of flies, I defy the grid
You've been standing in that same spot since you were a kid
I'm slippery, chaotic, a glitch in the biological code
You're just waiting for a lost dog to relieve his load

[Verse 4 - Male Vocal]
I'm forty percent cellulose and sixty percent hate
You're a snack for a largemouth bass, simply bait
Keep your wizardry, I have vascular strength and thick skin
You're a squishy little mistake destined for the bin

[Outro]

title: Arabic Folk Ballad
positivePrompt: An emotive Arabic folk song beginning with a virtuosic, melancholic oud solo, soon joined by an expressive violin playing in harmony. A steady, mid-tempo groove is established by hand percussion, likely a darbuka and riq. A warm, clear male vocal enters, delivering a heartfelt melody with characteristic Arabic ornamentation. The arrangement features instrumental breaks where the oud and violin engage in intricate, improvisational-sounding solos. The track builds to a dynamic instrumental section with rapid, cascading runs from the oud and violin before concluding with a final, resonant oud chord.

title: Esta Noche (Reggaeton)
positivePrompt: A modern reggaeton track with a strong flamenco influence, opening with a pitched and chopped vocal sample melody over a classic dembow beat. A clear, confident female vocal enters, singing in Spanish with a touch of reverb. The arrangement is built on a deep sub-bass, crisp drum machine percussion, and a distinctive plucked synth guitar riff that carries the main melodic hook. The chorus elevates the energy with layered vocals and a more intense delivery. The track breaks down into a more atmospheric bridge with filtered, introspective vocals before returning to the full chorus and concluding with a sparse, whispered outro that fades to silence.

positivePrompt: A clean, melodic electric guitar loop with a slightly lo-fi, chiptune-like quality establishes the track's foundation. A punchy, straightforward drum machine beat and a subtle synth bass enter, supporting a confident male vocal performance in Thai. The delivery blends melodic rap with sung passages, maintaining a consistent, assertive tone throughout the verses and chorus. The arrangement features instrumental breaks where the guitar loop is layered with evolving synth textures and arpeggios, adding a slightly electronic depth before returning to the core vocal and guitar -driven groove.

title: Dawn Light (Cantopop)
positivePrompt: A polished Cantopop track built on an ethereal foundation of layered female vocal harmonies that create atmospheric pads with wordless 'oohs' and 'aahs'. A crisp electronic drum machine provides a steady mid-tempo beat, complemented by clean synth keys and a subtle bassline. The lead female vocal is clear and melodic, sung entirely in Cantonese, guiding the listener through verses and into an uplifting chorus where her voice becomes more powerful and layered. The arrangement includes brief instrumental interludes featuring chime-like sound effects before concluding with a fade-out of the signature airy vocal textures.
